item.description:
Canobie Lake Park has over 85 Rides, Games, Live Entertainment, and Attractions!

Tax Free Shopping
Stop by our numerous Gift Shops located throughout the Park for everything from everyday items to life-long keep-sakes.


Canobie lake Park is a small New England amusement park, Close to home, good prices on admission and food and tons to do for the little ones.





This will be a pay your own way event, it will also be kid friendly

prices are as follows:

General admission: $30
Under 48" or over 60 yrs old: $21
Ages 3 and under always FREE
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting by the ticket booths
item.name: Canobie Lake Park
